title: Sefaria Community,
text: As a non-profit organization, Sefaria relies 100% on donations to keep the library open, running, and free. When you make a gift to Sefaria, you help people all around the world not just obtain the texts of our tradition — online and for free — but confidently navigate the canon and discover new horizons. Please make a gift today to ensure that 2022 is filled with Torah study!
name: 26122021-donate-banner-1
